page.title: 11INTERVIEWING OUR POLICEMAN
page.content: He's been a policeman in {Broughton {Astley}for three years but has worked in{Lutterworth}for eight years.He trained at{Ryton}on{Dunsmore}near{ Coventry.He had practical training in arresting people and dealing with road accidents.He also trained in field sports and self defence.He works around the clock but in shifts of eight hours a day.He tries to prevent crime,car accidents and burglaries. Sometimes he stays at Lutterworth to work on other cases.For the size of the village he thinks there is little vandalism or serious crime.He was once attacked when arresting someone.An off duty policeman called for help.He did most of the things kids do but he was never caught.His hobbies are stamp collecting,wine making,reading and gardening.
